function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate adoption of risk assessment in project management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the link between value and risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overprovision of information and functionality leading to increased project cost","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lean construction and value engineering may not address the risk of contagious disease transmission in the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The research involving data collection may involve direct contact with individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality assurance team assessing deliverables can lead to gatherings and meetings, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Industrialist inputs collected through questionnaires may involve physical handling of documents, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to lack of attention to facility management and disease control measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of value engineering and project management activities may neglect health and safety considerations, leading to increased risk of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability and consistency of data collection and analysis may overlook the impact of contagious diseases and their influence on project management and value engineering","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for space in houses to accommodate work from home could lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in sales of residential units and shift towards gated communities may lead to overpopulation in certain areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in the supply chain for construction materials could lead to delays in project completion and impact the health and safety of workers due to prolonged exposure to construction sites.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High dependence on migrant workers in the construction sector","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased labor working hours without addressing labor concerns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact on labor costs, project costs, and recovery of damages","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity and proper guidance in the virtual workforce","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in the construction sector","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption in work and movement of labor due to economic recession and covid-19 outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Liquidity risk may cause work stoppage due to fragile economic scenario.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimating the full financial impact of the coronavirus crisis.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monsoon season obstructing work from june 2020.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of space management in commercial buildings leading to overcrowding and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited budget and low innovation and technology in facility management services due to the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased workload and need for regular maintenance among blue-collar workers in commercial buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Off-site construction and modular construction may lead to standardization and lack of customization, increasing the risk of disease spread due to common design elements.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in productivity due to working with personal protective equipment and lengthening working hours to 12 hours","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Escalation of cement and sand prices by 5% due to supply chain disruption and less availability","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased space utilization and warehouse efficiency due to supply chain disruption and less availability","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disputes between client and contractor regarding loss-sharing and claims due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased workload on blue-collar workers due to the need for facility management services and creating a safer workplace for workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unforeseen delays, inflation, and weather impacts affecting project scope, scheduling, and costing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low client satisfaction and service quality in the indian construction and real estate sector","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low prevalence of lean construction and skilled contractors/workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of value-based approach in indian construction sector","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low implementation of value engineering in construction projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited functionality improvement with new technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of project overrun and delay","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of focus on environmental protection and social issues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address sustainable development goals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disregard for sustainable consumption and production","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Current covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human health risk of global magnitude","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of human health in sustainability goals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of inclusion of human health in the definition of sustainability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address physical and mental health as a separate fourth pillar of sustainability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of 'society' as inclusive of human health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on mental health due to covid-19, including economic instability, domestic violence, and fear among healthcare workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic instability, decreased conservation efforts, and plummeting economy due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in human activity leading to unattended and endangered species","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
